content.en: Power system optimization: Researchers have been investigating the effectiveness of various algorithms in improving the control of power systems. These algorithms, such as adaptive fuzzy logic, genetic algorithms, and optimization techniques, are attributed to the agency of algorithms in load frequency control and power-frequency balance. They have also been found to enhance frequency control, voltage/frequency stability, automatic generation control, and frequency-voltage regulation in power systems.
content.da: Optimering af elsystemer: Forskere har undersøgt effektiviteten af forskellige algoritmer i forbedringen af styringen af elsystemer. Disse algoritmer, såsom adaptiv fuzzy logik, genetiske algoritmer og optimeringsteknikker, tilskrives algoritmernes rolle i belastningsfrekvensstyring og kraftfrekvensbalance. Det er også blevet konstateret, at de forbedrer frekvensstyring, spændings-/frekvensstabilitet, automatisk genereringskontrol og frekvens-spændingsregulering i elsystemer.
